name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 7 (Released) Zibo, Shandong. Netizens took photos of a local rural morning market, sparking heated discussions among netizens.
Netizens said: "Was this taken decades ago?" "Is this North Korea?" "It's different from what I saw on TV, is it true?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 2, Xuancheng, Anhui. A man sued the Xuancheng City Government for not accepting applications for assemblies, parades, demonstrations and administrative reconsideration.
Netizen: You are a warrior

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 7, Liaoning. A woman joined the Hulanbu Uncle Spicy Hot Pot restaurant, but lost 460,000 yuan in half a year, 10 times the actual promised turnover. The woman knelt outside the restaurant to defend her rights.
December 7, Henan. The Xinyuanfu real estate project was left unfinished, and some owners who were defending their rights were locked up in a police car by the police and were about to be taken away. Other owners shouted: Release them! Release them!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 4, homeowners in a residential complex in Shiyan, Hubei Province, collectively surrounded the sales office to protest their rights, shouting for heating. The sales office responded: There will be no heating this year. The homeowners were still making a scene this morning.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution Recently, parents of senior high school students of Yuelu Senior High School in Yinchuan, Ningxia went to the Education Bureau to ask for an explanation because the Education Bureau did not allow them to have extra classes on weekends. Parents paraded in front of the Education Bureau with banners, telling the Education Bureau that they should go to school to do homework on weekends. Eventually, the school resumed extra classes on weekends.
After the extra classes were resumed, some parents said: Finally, there is good news. Now we parents can finally feel at ease.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Abandoned mailboxes at Ruian Jinhu Experimental Primary School found multiple complaints about teachers' corporal punishment and indifference to school bullying. Ruian Education Bureau said: The teacher involved has been criticized and educated

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, the Syrian government forces abandoned Homs and the opposition forces surrounded Damascus. According to Bloomberg, Syrian dictator Assad has secretly contacted the United States and made overtures. Assad proposed to the United States through the UAE that if Western countries exert influence to stop the fighting, Syria will stop all exchanges with Iranian-backed radical organizations such as Hezbollah. In addition, Assad also sent people to meet with Hungarian Prime Minister Orban to convey the message that Islamic rebels may threaten the safety of Christian minorities in Syria.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 6, the National Security Bureau posted a message on its WeChat official account: Be vigilant against foreign forces infiltrating minors

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: At about 8:40 am on December 4, a student of Changsha Construction Engineering School (Jingwanzi Campus, a private technical secondary school) was forced to jump off a building and died due to campus bullying. The student who jumped off the building had repeatedly reported to his parents that someone in the school bullied him, and also reported it to the class teacher many times. Now the school has flatly denied the existence of campus bullying and is only willing to give 50,000 yuan in compensation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a blogger on Douyin interviewed a migrant worker in his 60s. He worked all his life but could not guarantee a living in his later years. He had to work as a laborer.
The blogger asked the migrant worker: Will you come back (to this world) in the next life?
The migrant worker replied: I'd rather not come back. It's boring. This life is too much. Farmers are suffering beyond words now.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 7, a netizen took a taxi at Qingdao Jiaodong Airport. The driver said that he had queued for 19 hours at the airport just to take this order. His monthly income was 5,000 yuan, half of what it was before. The economy is poor and fewer people take taxis.
The driver also mentioned: Jiaozhou civil servants, teachers in the system, and the bus group are now unable to pay their salaries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Ningbo female vendor was asked to borrow 50 yuan to pay the fine to the urban management. Ningbo local report: The law enforcement officer used inappropriate language and has been criticized and educated. The Urban Management Bureau has visited the person in person and sincerely apologized.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 17, a parent posted that Fujian Pingtan Lanhua Middle School fined children 10 yuan each time they were late for school.
On December 6, the school responded that the fine was collected by the Parents' Committee and that the class teacher had communicated with the Parents' Committee.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a third-grade teacher in a primary school in Zhengzhou, Henan, beat a child with a stick, causing bruises on his arm because the child did not listen in class. The teacher admitted and apologized on the phone, saying that he accidentally hit the child because the student kept looking down and playing during the class, and he hit him in a hurry. On December 5, a staff member of Zhengzhou Yuhua Experimental Primary School said that teachers who hit others will be punished and will be reported to the principal for implementation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of local time in Syria, the Turkish-backed Syrian rebels HTS entered Damascus. Bashar al-Assad's regime collapsed completely.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Reuters, Assad boarded a plane and left Damascus before the fall of Damascus, but his whereabouts are unknown. Data from the Flightradar website showed that a Syrian Airlines plane took off from Damascus airport when the Syrian capital was reportedly occupied by rebels. The plane initially flew to the Syrian coastal area, the stronghold of Assad's Alawite faction, but then suddenly turned around and flew in the opposite direction for several minutes before disappearing from the map. Reuters was unable to confirm whether Assad was on the plane or the status of the plane.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today is the 30th anniversary of the "Karamay Fire" incident, and netizens have posted articles to mourn.
On December 8, 1994, the Education Bureau of Karamay City, Xinjiang, organized a cultural performance by 15 schools to welcome the higher-level education committee. During the performance, the stage curtain spontaneously caught fire due to overheating of the stage lights. The fire caused 325 deaths, including 288 primary and secondary school students.
Because when the fire broke out, someone shouted to the students "Let the leaders go first", this sentence has become synonymous with this incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Chinese experts analyze the situation in Syria:
Professor Jin Canrong: The Syrian government forces were caught off guard. As long as they don't panic, they should be able to stabilize the situation.
Middle East expert Li Shaoxian: With Russia and Iran, it is unlikely that the Syrian anti-government forces will overthrow the government.
Netizens responded: "Experts have never been right once" "This slap was loud"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yi Gang, former governor of the People's Bank of China, publicly stated that China's non-retaliation against the high tariffs imposed by the United States is the best economic solution. However, Yi Gang also pointed out that "from a political perspective, not retaliation may not be able to deal with domestic public opinion", which may force policy makers to do something that seems unreasonable from an economic perspective.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 7, Anhui. A ragged old man who collects rubbish sang "Yingshanhong" in front of the camera: In the middle of the night, I look forward to the dawn, in the cold winter, I look forward to the spring breeze... This sparked heated discussions and resonance among netizens.
Netizens replied "Grandma has been looking forward to a good life all her life" "I am looking forward to it too, but I am afraid it will not come"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 30, a netizen posted that he pretended to be a student when traveling in Egypt and lied to the staff of tourist attractions that he forgot to bring his student card to get a discount on tickets.
Netizens in the comment section also said that they had done this before.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 7 (Released) Fuzhou Fuqing. It was revealed online that Honglu Middle School conducted a political review of the 2025 high school graduates.
The political review will investigate the family background of the students' great-grandfathers, such as poor peasants, landlords, etc. It will also investigate whether the students' parents are members of the Communist Party of China. If not, they will fill in "clean political history" and whether the parents have any major problems.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Last year, Syrian President Assad and his wife went to the Lingyin Temple in China to pray and visit. As a result, the Assad regime in Syria fell a year later. Netizens said: Lingyin Temple is so spiritual, I must go to Lingyin Temple someday.
On that day, the Weibo topic #Lingyin Temple# rushed to the top of the hot search.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 7, the boy passed by an old man on a bicycle. The old man grabbed the boy and threw him to the ground. The boy shouted: "You are scamming me!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 7, Zhoukou, Henan. A man's coat was stolen from his car. After calling the police, the police officer asked, "How much is the coat?" The man replied, "A few dozen yuan." The police officer looked impatient and hung up the phone before the man finished speaking. Netizens responded, "You should say there was rat poison in the coat." "Brother, you have to speak English."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, a student from Shanxi University reported that she was molested by a foreign student from Turkmenistan. After calling the police, the surveillance video was clearly conclusive, but the foreign student refused to admit it and was arrogant. Afterwards, the school contacted her through someone else to delete the post, and the foreign student was only detained for five days. The woman also revealed: "It seems that I gave (the foreign student) more than 2,000 yuan a month."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Syrians are ransacking Assad's presidential palace, merrily moving things and making fun of Assad and his family.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, former South Korean Defense Minister Kim Yong-hyun was detained for sedition, becoming the first person to be detained in connection with the case. He had proposed to President Yoon Seok-yeol last week's martial law, and he resigned after the failure.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Syrians found Bashar al-Assad's private garage, which contained luxury cars such as Mercedes-Benz, BMW, and Ferrari.
Last year, when Assad visited the Lingyin Temple in China, he wore a pair of leather shoes that were so old that they turned white, and many netizens praised him for his integrity and simplicity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In September 2023, Lingyin Temple opened its main gate to Syrian President Assad and his wife as an exception.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 8, in a post on Xiaohongshu, civil servants from all over the country complained about the formalism and internal friction in their current work: 1 person does the work, 4 people supervise, and 6 people evaluate.
The post was subsequently deleted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Hua Chunying tweeted: Why does the United States think it has the right to deprive China or other countries of their legitimate right to development? President Xi once said: Practicing protectionism is like locking yourself in a dark room

The U.S. embassy and consulate in China retorted: China does not have the "legitimate rights" it claims to have for American technology that is vital to our national security. What is it complaining about? China prohibits the export of its sensitive technology to the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Syrians entered Assad's palace to celebrate, and the scene was packed with people.
Syrians sang and danced to celebrate the end of the Assad era.
Syrian Christians rang church bells and celebrated the fall of the Assad regime under the Christmas tree.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The gates of a Syrian prison were opened and prisoners poured out. One of them asked: "I have been in prison for 10 years. What happened?" "The regime collapsed." Then he laughed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Assad regime has imprisoned entire families and even children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 7, Jiaxing, Zhejiang. After receiving the food, the woman ordered a takeaway and applied for a refund on the grounds that "the rider did not deliver it to the place", resulting in the deliveryman being fined 100 yuan.
The deliveryman then went to the door to argue: Why do you want a refund after receiving the food? The woman replied: "You can go to the platform customer service yourself"
Deliveryman: If you don't apply for a refund, the platform will not refund. I can treat you to a meal for a dozen yuan, do you really need that 10 or 20 yuan?
Woman: It's very bad.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Many Kurds in Syria took to the streets to destroy statues and monuments of the old Assad. After the statues fell, people at the scene cheered.
The Kurds are the largest minority in Syria and have long suffered oppression under the Assad regime.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Two children urinated on the statue and then stepped on it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Syrians pull down statue of Assad

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 8, artist Cai Guoqiang had an accident while performing a drone fireworks show in Quanzhou.
Because the backup drone for filming was not reported to the air traffic control, it was detected and identified as an unknown drone by the police, and the jammer gun was immediately activated, causing all the drones performing on the scene to be shot down.
Some netizens said that Cai Guoqiang himself was very calm at the scene, saying that "hundreds of drones exploded on the ground" and "please help clean up, don't take them home."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Just now, Al Jazeera reporter reported from Assad's presidential palace in Damascus, Syria. 
The reporter said that since arriving here, he has not felt any danger, except for a lot of celebratory gunfire.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Residents of Damascus took to the streets to celebrate the fall of the Assad regime.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Image 1: A Syrian rebel soldier tramples a statue of Assad. Image 2: A billboard with Assad's image is riddled with bullet holes. Image 3: People burn a flag with Assad's image on it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, the "positive energy" blogger Zhengzhi Leige posted a microblog saying: China has been passive in public opinion and financial warfare, and one of the main reasons is that the internal traitors have not been eliminated. Some of the comprador forces in China have great power behind them, and even involve certain families. If this thing is not eliminated, it will be difficult for China to gain the upper hand in the financial public opinion war, and the legacy problems of some families can only be changed when their older generations die.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 7 (Release) In Beijing, a deliveryman named "Brother Bao" was banned by the platform because of his old age. Brother Bao said that he responded to the call to help Beijing. Now he is not allowed to work. He has been lying down for several days without eating. College students can't find jobs now, and he is over 60 years old, so he can't find a job.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Dortmund, Germany. Syrian refugees celebrate the fall of Assad in the streets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Syrian Consulate in Spain, staff replace the new Syrian flag

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Jiangxi, a man posted a photo of his Burmese girlfriend on a social platform.
As a result, netizens in the comment area suggested that the man restrict her personal freedom as soon as possible to prevent her from escaping. One netizen replied: "Just lock her up with an iron chain."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the streets of Damascus, the uniforms of Bashar al-Assad's troops can be seen everywhere.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: HTS leader Abu Mohammad al-Julani arrives in Damascus, Syria.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today (December 8), the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced that Syrian President Bashar al-Assad has given up the presidency after negotiations with representatives of all parties to the Syrian conflict and instructed the Syrian government to peacefully transfer power.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One month after the SUV hit people in Zhuhai, Guangdong, on December 8, the mayor and deputy mayor of Zhuhai resigned, and Xie Rensi was removed from his position as director of the Zhuhai Public Security Bureau.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 7, Baoji, Shaanxi. Netizens captured a magical scene on the roadside:
A man took off his clothes and knelt down in front of a domestic mobile phone store, and then another uncle walked past the man holding a flag with Chairman Mao's portrait.
Netizens replied "Is this West Korea?"
